intro: Psychotria aurantiibractea, commonly known as the red-bract psychotria, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to the tropical regions of South America, particularly Brazil. The plant is characterized by its striking red bracts that enclose the small, white flowers. Its leaves are typically elliptical and have a glossy surface. Psychotria aurantiibractea is often found in humid, shaded environments within tropical rainforests.
